epics.title: Task Management Core Functionality
epics.description: Develop the core features of the To-Do List application, enabling users to add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. This epic is critical to delivering the primary business value: allowing users to efficiently manage their daily tasks.

stories.title: Add New Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.

subtasks.title: Design Add Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI components for task input fields and add button.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task Logic
subtasks.description: Implement frontend logic to handle task creation and validation.

subtasks.title: Create Task Model and API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Design backend data model and implement API endpoint for creating tasks.

subtasks.title: Test Add Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for adding tasks, including validation.

stories.title: Edit Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an existing task's title and description so that I can update my tasks as needed.

subtasks.title: Design Edit Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for editing tasks inline or in a modal.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task Logic
subtasks.description: Implement frontend logic for editing and saving task changes.

subtasks.title: Update Task API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement backend endpoint for updating tasks.

subtasks.title: Test Edit Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for editing tasks.

stories.title: Mark Task as Completed
stories.description: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so that I can track which tasks are done.

subtasks.title: Design Completed Task UI
subtasks.description: Update UI to visually distinguish completed tasks.

subtasks.title: Implement Complete/Uncomplete Logic
subtasks.description: Implement frontend logic for marking tasks as completed/uncompleted.

subtasks.title: Update Task Status API
subtasks.description: Implement backend logic to update task completion status.

subtasks.title: Test Mark as Completed
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed/uncompleted.

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a task so that I can remove tasks I no longer need.

subtasks.title: Design Delete Task UI
subtasks.description: Add delete button and confirmation prompt to task UI.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task Logic
subtasks.description: Implement frontend logic for deleting tasks.

subtasks.title: Delete Task API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement backend endpoint for deleting tasks.

subtasks.title: Test Delete Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for deleting tasks.

stories.title: Display All Tasks in a List
stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a list so that I can view and manage them easily.

subtasks.title: Design Task List UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for displaying tasks in a list format.

subtasks.title: Implement Task List Rendering
subtasks.description: Implement frontend logic to render and update the task list.

subtasks.title: Get All Tasks API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement backend endpoint to fetch all tasks.

subtasks.title: Test Task List Display
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for displaying and updating the task list.

epics.title: Responsive Web Application & Performance
epics.description: Ensure the To-Do List application is responsive and performs well on both desktop and mobile browsers, loading within 3 seconds. This epic is essential for user satisfaction and meeting technical requirements.

stories.title: Responsive UI Design
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to look good and be usable on both desktop and mobile devices.

subtasks.title: Design Responsive Layout
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for desktop and mobile views.

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Styles
subtasks.description: Develop CSS and frontend logic for responsive design.

subtasks.title: Test Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Test app on various devices and browsers for responsiveness.

stories.title: Performance Optimization
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to load quickly (within 3 seconds) so I can access my tasks without delay.

subtasks.title: Optimize Asset Loading
subtasks.description: Minimize and compress CSS, JS, and image assets.

subtasks.title: Implement Code Splitting
subtasks.description: Split code to load only necessary modules on demand.

subtasks.title: Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Test and document app load times on various devices and networks.

stories.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to work correctly on all major browsers.

subtasks.title: Set Up Browser Testing Matrix
subtasks.description: Define and document supported browsers and versions.

subtasks.title: Manual Cross-Browser Testing
subtasks.description: Test app manually on all supported browsers.

subtasks.title: Automated Cross-Browser Testing
subtasks.description: Set up automated tests for cross-browser compatibility.

stories.title: Deployment Pipeline
stories.description: As a developer, I want a simple CI/CD pipeline so that the app can be deployed quickly and reliably.

subtasks.title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Configure CI/CD for automated build and deployment.

subtasks.title: Configure Hosting Environment
subtasks.description: Set up hosting (e.g., Vercel, Netlify, AWS) for the app.

subtasks.title: Implement Rollback Mechanism
subtasks.description: Ensure ability to revert to previous deployment if needed.

epics.title: Product Management, QA, and Documentation
epics.description: Coordinate project management, quality assurance, and documentation to ensure successful delivery, maintainability, and knowledge transfer.

stories.title: Project Planning and Tracking
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to plan, track, and report on project progress to ensure timely delivery.

subtasks.title: Create Project Plan
subtasks.description: Develop detailed project plan and timeline.

subtasks.title: Set Up Tracking Tools
subtasks.description: Configure Jira/Trello for tracking epics, stories, and tasks.

subtasks.title: Provide Status Updates
subtasks.description: Prepare and share weekly status reports.

stories.title: Comprehensive QA Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to ensure the app is bug-free and meets requirements.

subtasks.title: Write Test Cases
subtasks.description: Develop test cases for all user stories.

subtasks.title: Execute Manual Testing
subtasks.description: Perform manual testing of all features.

subtasks.title: Regression Testing
subtasks.description: Conduct regression testing before release.

stories.title: User and Developer Documentation
stories.description: As a developer, I want clear documentation so that users and future developers can understand and maintain the app.

subtasks.title: Write User Guide
subtasks.description: Document how to use the app for end users.

subtasks.title: Write API Documentation
subtasks.description: Document all backend API endpoints.

subtasks.title: Code Comments and README
subtasks.description: Add comments and create a README for the codebase.
